turn.1: What year did the musical A Very Potter Musical take place?

turn.4: A third installment called "A Very Potter Senior Year" premiered at LeakyCon on August 11, 2012.
turn.5: Are there any other interesting aspects about this article?
turn.6: Harry Potter, the legendary " Boy Who Lived", rejoices that he is entering his second year at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry with his best friend Ron Weasley and frumpy nerd Hermione Granger ("Gotta Get Back to Hogwarts").
turn.7: Is that where he attends school?
turn.8: Headmaster of Hogwarts Albus Dumbledore welcomes everyone back, skips the Sorting Ceremony and introduces the House Cup Tournament, in which a champion will be chosen on behalf of each House (Gryffindor, Ravenclaw, Hufflepuff, and Slytherin) to fight for the House Cup.
turn.9: Is that where he performs the musical?
turn.10: The names are chosen out of a magical trophy by Potions Master, Severus Snape, with Harry being chosen for Gryffindor.
turn.11: Who were some of the characters?
turn.12: The other champions are his crush Cho Chang (Ravenclaw), her current boyfriend Cedric Diggory (Hufflepuff) and Harry's obnoxious rival, Draco Malfoy (Slytherin).
